name: Knight of the SilverEye
description:
Knight of the SilverEye is a adventure game that will force your guard up and challenge you to your very last breath... Take control of the SilverEye Knight, who is on a personal mission to track down missing knights from his elite guild, leading himself to a mysterious island, inhabited by the forces of darkness with a sinister plan...

Gameplay Features:

 *This is a demo version of the game.

- Various weapons and combat strategies to survive in a fantasy world.
- Save system / checkpoint system for players to save progress.
-  Creepy and hostile environments using a third-person perspective.
- Key system / item pickups implemented in game along with narrative note system.
- Supernatural creatures with diverse move-sets.
- Terrifying boss fight to challenge the player's awareness and skills.
- Recommended that 1280x720p be the chosen resolution for players with low-range hardware.
